io.janusproject.kernel.bic

Interface MicroKernelCapacity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Capacity

    public interface MicroKernelCapacity
extends Capacity
    Capacity that provides an access to the micro kernel, according to the FIPA specs.

    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05

    Stéphane Galland
